TopicTitle: Flying a Spaceplane at night, PLUS, without SAS.

Articles.Content:
I challenge any brave kerbonaut who is brave enough to fly a spaceplane at night, without SAS used. This is for kerbonauts with a lot of experience of flying without ASAS or any kind of SAS.

I have done it, and so can you!

Tell me right HERE whether you were successful, good luck, PEACE!

Yes I was. Does that mean I win?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide

Tell me right HERE whether you were successful, good luck, PEACE!

Because your link is missing a n d this is only possible to judge for your when a video is presented, i can say that for the most of us this challenge might be impossible to join.

I don't even think this is a challenge.

This is something many people do routinely and if you make a challenge, show your attempt.

Just about every challenge has their creators attempting it themselves.
Ignore this post. I posted in the wrong thread. :|
Some planes kill themselves if SAS is turned on. I've done this too many times to count.
